column1: '''Coleman Charlton''' is an American table-top game designer. He was one of the founders of [[Iron Crown Enterprises]], and designed the ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' game system<ref>''Iron Crown Quarterly'' (Issue 1, Summer 1988), p.9</ref> and the ''[[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]]''<ref>''CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter'', Issue 4 (January 1999)</ref>
In the late 1990s, Coleman Charlton and [[Pete Fenlon]], his long-time colleague from ICE, joined the Mayfair Game company.<ref>[http://www.mayfairgames.com/ Mayfair Games web site]</ref>
